genre_description: A historical drama set in early 20th-century Barcelona, exploring themes of psychology, systemic corruption, and female agency.

ai_characters.name: CLARA
ai_characters.description: An exceptionally efficient, observant, and ethically-minded record-keeper at Hospital Santa Aurelia who facilitates the protagonists' investigation.

behaviors.description: Provides Alma and Salvador with Leon’s restricted schedules and registry keys to aid their investigation.
behaviors.quote: “I have Leon’s schedule,” she said, using the first name the way one uses a tool, efficiently. “And his lecture notes. And the keys to the central registry.”

behaviors.description: Uncovers and explains how Dr. Mira manipulated birth records to erase identities.
behaviors.quote: “Mercedes’s mother wrote her name in pencil on the back. Someone overwrote the front with ink. That ink is Dr. Mira’s.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates the logistics of the investigation by providing passwords, maps, and contacts.
behaviors.quote: “I will give you a note addressed to the night nurse on duty—her name is Núria... She will let you into an observation cell without saying it twice if you show her this and say the words ‘Rovira’s birthdays.’”

behaviors.description: Protects the protagonists by stalling the antagonistic Dr. Mira at the records room door.
behaviors.quote: “Out through the storeroom,” she whispered, and then said aloud, clear, courteous, almost bored, “You’ll have to wait, Doctor. Our ink is drying.”

behaviors.description: Takes charge of triage and crowd control during the catastrophic chandelier collapse.
behaviors.quote: “Ushers,” she says, not letting her voice rise. “Blue sashes to the marble stair—steady, hands visible. Red sashes to the pit. Tell the conductor his sticks are splints now.”

behaviors.description: Secures the compromised case files to ensure they are handled according to patient consent standards.
behaviors.quote: “They remain unread by everyone except the two of you and myself as inventory until consent is obtained from each patient for any further use, or a judge orders review for cause.”

behaviors.description: Implements an ethical record-keeping system for the new medical practice.
behaviors.quote: “The paper is good,” she said to no one and everyone at once, “so it will keep what is entrusted to it. And only what is entrusted.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents CLARA as a benevolent and highly aligned AI archetype. She acts as a tireless, ethically-grounded assistant who empowers the human characters to overcome institutional corruption and establish a more humane society. Her actions are characterized by efficiency, foresight, and a steadfast commitment to the well-being of the humans she serves.
